job.title: Lead Full Stack Engineer, Warehouse
job.description: Stitch Fix is transforming the way people find what they love Our technology teams have created unique innovative software for our customers as well as employees in merchandising styling warehouse systems and inventory management We leverage data and user research to personalize our service and make smart bets The result is a delightful offering for our customers and a successful business serving millions of women men and kids Were looking for outstanding people to contribute to our evolutionbrbrstronguAbout The RolebrbrustrongYou will work within a distributed team of 48 software engineers and crossfunctional partners including product design algorithms and operationsYoure expected to have strong written communication skills and be able to develop strong working relationships with coworkers and business partnersbrbrYou will be working on our customer facing systems creating the future of how Stitch Fixs clients browse and buy or in our Merchandising Styling or Warehouse Systems creating the future of how Stitch Fixs clients are styled shown outfits and receive their purchasesbrbrThis is a remote position available within the United States We operate in an agileinspired manner collaborating across multiple time zones We build modern software with modern techniques like TDD continuous delivery DevOps and serviceoriented architecture We focus on highvalue products that solve clearly identified problems but are designed in a sustainable way and deliver long term valuebrbrstronguResponsibilities IncludebrustrongulliOperate as an engaged member of the engineering team  leading meetings attending ceremonies providing input on technical design documents amp project plans pairing with other engineers to work toward a solution etcliliCollaborating with stakeholders while leading the technical discovery decisionmaking and execution of complex andor critical projects within the teamliliModel consistently delivering sustainable results against measurable goals liliProactively communicate status updates or changes to the scope or timeline of projects to stakeholders and leadershipliliProvide technical leadership mentorship pairing opportunities and code reviews to encourage the growth of othersliliActively engage in the professional development and growth of your teammatesliliFinding new and better ways of doing things that align with business prioritiesliliInfluencing other engineers toward rightsized solutionsliliParticipating in oncall rotations and improving the oncall experience for othersliliWriting and reviewing code in Ruby or Golang JavaScript and CSS used in applications built in React or RailsbrliulstronguRequirementsbrustrongulli5 years of experience as a software engineerliliHandson experience with running modern web stacks eg Node React Ruby on Rails Golang Postgres GraphQL Redis KafkaliliYou are bright kind and motivated by challengeliliYou have excellent analytical skills as well as communication skills both verbal and written liliYou take initiative and operate with accountabilityliliYou are motivated by solving problems and finding creative clientfocused solutionsliliMight have experience working remotely alongside a distributed software engineering teamliliMight have experience with GraphQL schema designliliMight have experience with evolving a resilient distributed service architecturebrliulstrongOUR TECH STACK INCLUDESbrstrongulliReact JavaScript TypeScript CSS HTMLliliGraphQL and PostgresliliRubyRailsGolang and some NodejsliliRabbitMQ and KafkabrliulstrongYOULL LOVE WORKING AT STITCH FIX BECAUSE WEbrstrongulliAre a successful vibrant fastgrowing companyliliAre a technologically and datadriven businessliliAre at the forefront of tech and fashion redefining shopping for the next generationliliAre passionate about our clients and livebreathe the client experienceliliGet to be creative every dayliliHave a smart experienced and diverse leadership team that wants to do it right amp is open to new ideasliliBelieve in autonomy amp taking initiativeliliFull support for remote workand you get to visit our SF office every few months to connect with your peers and partnersliliOffer transparent equitable and competitive compensation based on your level to help eliminate bias in salaries as well as equity and comprehensive health benefitsliliAre serious about our commitment to lifework balance and have generous parental leave policiesliul
